text_block_list.text: On one of the days leading up to the Selection Race ——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: You're dropping out!? What are you on about!!

Hishi Amazon's shocked voice rattled down from the rooftop. 
…… Let me go see what's going on.

I was greeted by the sight of Hishi Amazon and that junior girl 
she was helping with training the other day.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Are you serious? Dropping out of Tracen Academy…?

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: …… I'm serious. I just… can't keep up here anymore.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: What makes you say that?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I remember what you told me… the day you 
showed up at the dorms and came to say hi.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That you had a rival you'd been battling with since forever! 
How you wanted to carry that on in the Twinkle Series 
and beat her!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: What happened to the passion you had back then…!!?

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: …… I don't.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
I don't have a rival anymore!! It's over… 
She won… the battle's over…!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: What, over……?

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
I've been seeing it coming, really. Since we 
came to this academy, she's only gotten faster… 
while I'm struggling to get anywhere.

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
I even bothered you to help me… but it wasn't enough. 
Yesterday she beat me… by 10 lengths……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Uck, that's certainly a blow, but……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
But you never know the future, do you!!? 
You could be the one winning by 10 lengths next race!

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: There's clearly no chance of that!!

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: …… I'm sorry, ma'am.

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
But I don't even have to try to know. 
My time battling with her is really over……

text_block_list.name: Miho Dorm Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: I should go now. Thanks for looking after me all this time…!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ah… h-hey! Wait…!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Why's she saying there's no chance… that it's over……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hwoah!? Oh… I recognize you……

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hah hah hah… not a great look, is it. I can't even support 
one of my juniors… some leader I am.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
She's convinced she doesn't stand a chance, 
but I don't think that's true. There's no point 
in just forcing my opinion on her, though.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Aaaagh, darn it!! What am I supposed to do…

Indeed, I could see this being a hurdle for someone 
as enthusiastic about competition as Hishi Amazon.
Left troubled, someone suddenly appeared before her ——

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Miss Amazon! There you are, I was looking for you!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Oh, Biko. What's up?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
We're entering the Selection Race on the same day, right? 
They just announced the groups, so I came to tell you!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: It looks like that Brian lady is in the same group as you!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: What……!?

Even amongst us trainers, Narita Brian's name was already 
well known. Her strength is downright overwhelming.

Her older sister, Biwa Hayahide, had already debuted 
and was performing spectacularly, but it's believed 
Narita Brian is the one with even greater talents.

I had thought even Hishi Amazon would be 
shuddering at the prospect, however…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: …… I see. Thanks, Biko.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: This could be convenient actually…!!
And with an ever-fearless smile, she ran off at full speed!!
Rushing after her, I eventually caught up to see ——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hruooooaaaaaaaaaahh!! …… Haah, haah, haah.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hm? Oh, you followed me?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Whatcha mean? I'm training, as you can see!! 
About 50 hill sprints to start with.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
No, maybe that's not enough? I'm going up against Brian here. 
I need to put my all into training to go one-on-one with her…!!
choice_data_list: You know no fear, do you…!
You know no fear, do you…!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Of course not! Can't have anyone looking 
down on the RA now, can we.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: …… Besides, hard as I try, I don't got Fuji's silver tongue.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
So all I can really do to support someone 
is show them how I go about things.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: But y'know, I intend to show them everything I got.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Nothing's set from the start! There's always a chance! 
You never know the outcome of a battle until you try…!!

Hishi Amazon's words were shockingly straightforward. 
I found myself drawn in to her, and the fire in her eyes.

I wanted to see what the future she was staring at was like. 
My thoughts manifested as words almost immediately ——
choice_data_list: Would you let me help with your training?
Would you let me help with your training?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Huh? You? You sure? When you're not even my trainer? Hahah, strange one, aren't ya?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Sure thing. In fact, that'd help me out. Go hard on me!!

And with that, I wound up helping Hishi Amazon train 
until the day of the Selection Race.
